backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing blob storage, access control, user profiles, editable website content, and admin-managed project CRUD.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme defining black, yellow, and metallic design tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting metadata, dark mode, Inter font, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with public and admin routes and shared header layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentEdi: Admin UI for editing website content including hero, services, clients, and contact sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProjectsEd: Admin tool for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting projects with image upload handling and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a login button for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides sign-in/out logic using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/site/AboutSectio: Renders the About Us section using provided company description and feature icons.
frontend/src/components/site/ClientsSect: Shows a grid of client entries from website content.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Displays contact details including address, owner, phone, and email.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright text and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Hero banner with headline, subheadline, background image, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/site/MaterialsSe: Presents a description of materials the company works with.
frontend/src/components/site/MetallicSur: Styled container component applying metallic-themed gradients and effects.
frontend/src/components/site/PortfolioSe: Displays project portfolio grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/site/ProjectCard: Displays a clickable project card with image, title, description, and a dialog showing full project details.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Renders a services grid using provided website content, showing service names and descriptions.
Implements the site header with navigation links, logo, and mobile menu using smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating content, projects, user profiles, and admin authorization via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with themed CSS variables, dark mode settings, global styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard that handles auth, profile setup, admin checks, and provides tabs for editing content and projects.
frontend/src/pages/PublicSite.tsx: Renders the public website by loading content and projects, showing skeletons while loading, and assembling all site sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks current project state, requirements, branding notes, images needed, and implemented features for the website build.
